bibl.title: Titles of parts and parts of a title: Incipits as possible indicators of textual traditions in Graeco-Roman tables of division
bibl.note: Offers a textual and chronological analysis of the headings of division tables, i.e. the lines occurring at the beginning of the tables and mentioning the divisor. - I. Introduction. - II. Divisors at the Beginning of Division Tables. - III. One or More Headings. - IV. Appendix.
bibl.seg: Giuseppina Azzarello, Titles of Parts and Parts of a Title: Incipits as Possible Indicators of Textual Traditions in Graeco-Roman Tables of Division.

Offers a textual and chronological analysis of the headings of division tables, i.e. the lines occurring at the beginning of the tables and mentioning the divisor. - I. Introduction. - II. Divisors at the Beginning of Division Tables. - III. One or More Headings. - IV. Appendix.
